name: Flo's V8 Cafe
location: Disney California Adventure Park, Cars Land

items.title: Spicy Chicken & Fries
items.description: Fries topped with Chicken Tenders tossed in a Mango-Habanero Sauce, drizzled with Ranch Dressing and finished with Green Onions

items.title: Flo's Famous Fried Chicken
items.description: with Roasted Garlic Mashed Potatoes, Gravy and Seasonal Vegetables

items.title: Race Day Salad
items.description: Fresh Romaine Lettuce topped with Golden Crispy Chicken, Crisp Snap Peas, Shaved Carrot, Zesty Ranch Dressing, Shredded Parmesan and Chopped Bacon

items.title: Pastrami Sandwich
items.description: Sliced Deli-style Pastrami, Swiss Cheese, Pickle Chips, Shredded Lettuce and Mustard on Fresh-sliced Rye Bread, served with choice of Cuties® Mandarin Oranges or Fries

items.title: Ka-Cheeseburger
items.description: Choice of Angus Beef & Mushroom Patty or Angus Beef Patty, American Cheese, Red Onions, Shredded Lettuce, Tomato, Pickles and 1000 Island on a Toasted Bun, served with choice of Cuties® Mandarin Oranges or Fries

items.title: Impossible™ Burger
items.description: Impossible™ Patty, American Cheese, Red Onions, shredded Lettuce, Tomato and Pickle Chips on a Toasted Bun, served with choice of Cuties® Mandarin Oranges or Fries

items.title: Micro Burger
items.description: Mini All-Beef Hamburger with a Cuties® Mandarin, Carrots and choice of Small Lowfat Milk or Small DASANI® Water. Meets Disney Nutrition Guidelines for Complete Meals without substitutions

items.title: Chicken Fenders
items.description: crispy Chicken Strips with a Cuties® Mandarin, Carrots and choice of Small Lowfat Milk or Small DASANI® Water

items.title: Mack's Mac & Cheese
items.description: with a Cuties® Mandarin, Carrots and choice of Small Lowfat Milk or Small DASANI® Water

items.title: Flo's Classic Shake
items.description: Vanilla, Chocolate, or Strawberry Shake topped with "Road Gravel"

items.title: Flo's Classic Shake in Souvenir Glass
items.description: Cars Land souvenir Shake glass served with Vanilla, Chocolate, or Strawberry Shake topped with "Road Gravel"

items.title: Seaborn Blackberry Margarita
items.description: Blackberry Margarita with a Chile-Lime and Black Salt Rim San Diego, CA (ABV 10%) served over ice

items.title: Seaborn Pineapple Habanero Margarita
items.description: Pineapple, Mild Habanero Margarita with a Chile-Lime Rim San Diego, CA (ABV 10%) served over Ice

items.title: Assorted Fountain Beverages - Regular
items.description: assorted Coca-Cola® offerings

items.title: Assorted Fountain Beverages - Large
items.description: assorted Coca-Cola® offerings

items.title: Guests must speak to a Cast Member about their allergy-friendly request
Gluten/Wheat Allergy-Friendly  Impossible™ Burger
items.description: Impossible™ Patty, American Cheese, Red Onions, Shredded Lettuce, Tomato and Pickles on an Allergy-Friendly Bun, served with choice of Cuties® Mandarin Oranges or Fries

items.title: Gluten/Wheat Allergy-Friendly Pastrami Sandwich
items.description: Pastrami with Pickles, Shredded Lettuce and Mustard on an Allergy-Friendly Bun, served with choice of Cuties® Mandarin Oranges or Fries

items.description: Mini All-Beef Patty on an Allergy-friendly Roll with a Cuties® Mandarin, Carrots and choice of Small Lowfat Milk or Small DASANI® Water
